    df.to_excel(new_file_location, index=False, header=True, sheet_name=sheet_name)

        raise FileNotFoundError(f"Original Excel file '{original_file_location}' not found.")

    original_file_path = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), original_file_location)
    new_file_path = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), new_file_location)

    wb = Workbook()
    ws = wb.active
    ws.title = sheet_name

    with pd.ExcelFile(original_file_path) as file:
        if sheet_name not in file.sheet_names:

        df = pd.read_excel(file, sheet_name)

        for row in df.index:
            ws.append(df.loc[row])

    wb.save(new_file_path)

    return pd.read_excel(new_file_path, sheet_name)
